name: Tidam
description:
Tidam is a free game for children from 2 to 5 years old that puts in scene simple characters with actions according to their age. Shifted, Tidam will seduce young and old.

Tidam does not contain ads, no external links, no videos, no in-app purchases

Tidam is a collection of 3 funny games for kids : 

Please note that:

- All the graphics are handmade,
- All the animations are original,
- The music comes from https://www.bensound.com,
- The sound effects were made by myself, my children and my wife =),
- Some graphics were done by my 7 year old daughter Eva.

Requirements : your graphic card need to support OpenGL drivers.

Thank you very much for your support and have fun !!

My website  :  www.baddevgames
